Uses of Class
net.sf.oval.constraint.ValidateWithMethod

Packages that use ValidateWithMethod
net.sf.oval.constraint This package contains the standard single-value validation constraints in form of Java5 Annotations that can be tagged to class fields, constructor parameters, method parameters and getter method return values. 
 

Uses of ValidateWithMethod in net.sf.oval.constraint
 

Methods in net.sf.oval.constraint with parameters of type ValidateWithMethod
 void ValidateWithMethodCheck.configure(ValidateWithMethod constraintAnnotation)
          Configures the check based on the given constraint annotation.
